newsitem.title: UK: LME copper ends kerb barely changed, nickel at low.
newsitem.headline: LME copper ends kerb barely changed, nickel at low.

text.p: COPPER - Ends just $1 firmer at $2,529, eases off fresh one-year highs during PM kerb.
NICKEL - Ends at day's lows of $7,200, off $80. Depressed by news of tentative contract agreement at Inco.
ALUMINIUM - Just easier. TIN - Below $5,600. ZINC - Down.
